pages.text: You don't know what grapes are, but they should be something purple.$(br)But as a genius who excels in both culinary arts and magic, you infused the sweet magical power from within amethyst crystals into puffball onions.$(br)This is totally grapes! Looks the same, tastes the same!$(br)Putting in small pieces of crushed ice to make a slush naturally makes the taste better.$(br)Grants the consumer Frost Resistance II (3.5 min), Nourishment (10 min), Chilling Aura (30s)
